text:
<@U07S0G1730T>, do you know what this error means?
```{
  "status":"error",
  "message":"Exception in external client",
  "errorType":"SequenceError.EXTERNAL_CLIENT_EXCEPTION"
}```
I've searched every piece of documentation HS has and could not find what this means.

Iâ€™ve hit a wall for using this API when it comes to enrolling contacts when the user that owns the sequence uses an alias instead of the primary connected account. I can enroll find using the main email account, but not the alias even though I can set the default email address in the UI when enrolling contacts to a given sequence. Is there any way around this?

```{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Connected inbox not found or not in ENABLED state for inboxAddress",
    "errorType": "SequenceError.CONNECTED_INBOX_NOT_FOUND",
    "correlationId": "d98ab3f4-f4f3-40a6-93dc-8e1c789911f5"
}```
Would like to help give some testing feedback to <@U07S0G1730T> and his team if any of them would like to chime in?
